nl.fw.yapool.listener

Class PoolListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.fw.yapool.listener.PoolListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, IPoolListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeaserAcquiredTrace, MaxUsageTracker, PoolEventLogger, PoolEventQueue, PoolPerformance, SimpleQueryCache

    public class PoolListener
extends Object
implements IPoolListener
    Base class for a pool listener that listens to all events.
    Author:
    Fred

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected org.slf4j.Logger log 
      protected boolean wantAllEventActions
      Default true which means this pool listener will receive all pool events.
      protected Set<String> wantEventActions
      Collections of pool-events to listen for.

    • Method Detail

      • addWantEvent

        protected void addWantEvent(String... events)
        Registers this pool listener for the given list of pool event actions. If needed, this method should be called from the contructor. Sets wantAllEventActions to false.
        Always use this method when possible: it can reduce pool-event (object creation) overhead considerably.
        Parameters:
        events -

      • wantsEventAction

        public boolean wantsEventAction(String eventAction)
        Specified by:
        wantsEventAction in interface IPoolListener
        Returns:
        true if this pool listener wants to receive the given pool event type.

      • wantAllEventActions

        public boolean wantAllEventActions()
        Specified by:
        wantAllEventActions in interface IPoolListener
        Returns:
        true if this pool listener wants to receive all pool events.

      • getWantEventActions

        public Collection<String> getWantEventActions()
        Specified by:
        getWantEventActions in interface IPoolListener
        Returns:
        collection of pool events that this pool listener wants to receive.
